title: Fix Contact Us mailto link to display email address

requirements.summary: Update Contact Us button mailto links in header and footer to properly open email client with viitjeetec@gmail.com
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Contact Us button in the header opens the default email client
Clicking the Contact Us button in the footer opens the default email client
Both mailto links pre-populate the To field with viitjeetec@gmail.com
The mailto link is properly formatted as href="mailto:viitjeetec@gmail.com"

file_operations.description: Fix the Contact Us button implementation by ensuring both header and footer buttons use properly formatted mailto links. Replace any incorrect link implementations with <a href="mailto:viitjeetec@gmail.com"> wrapped around the Contact Us button elements. Ensure the mailto protocol is correctly specified so clicking the buttons opens the user's default email client with viitjeetec@gmail.com pre-populated in the To field. Preserve existing button styling and warm orange theme colors.
